about.title: Welcome To Le Palace Marrakech
about.content_1: At Le Palace, where everything from the French-inspired food (and the prices) are over the top, the opulent decor is matched only by the clientele.
about.content_2: The lighting throughout the space is rich and warm, and the owner, Nordine Fakir, credits it for much of the restaurantâ€™s success. Most diners begin the evening sitting inside, but then make their way to the boudoir-esque basement, festooned in photos of Yves Saint Laurent, and where dancing on the furniture goes late into the night.

kitchen.title: Exquisite Dining Experience Fit for Royalty
kitchen.content_1: Le Palace Marrakech is a symphony of refined flavors, where French gastronomy meets international and Moroccan influences. The chefs, true artists, orchestrate a rich and varied menu: signature langoustine and foie gras ravioli, carefully selected steaks, and fish sublimated by inventive accompaniments.
kitchen.content_2: Every dish, from the most classic to the most daring, is designed to delight the palate. A selection of prestigious French wines and creative cocktails complete this unique culinary experience, where tradition and modernity blend elegantly to sublimate every mouthful.
